The training data extracted from the data: ex: 0,1,1

DataHolder<T> - Interface in parser
An interface that provides that provides 2 methods: readData and readLabels.
datamodel - package datamodel
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data
DataModel<T> - Interface in datamodel
An interface that exposes the services for a DataModel that saves counts extracted from training data.
datamodel.categories - package datamodel.categories
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data - more specifically, the data of features, for example X1, X2, X3
datamodel.classifications - package datamodel.classifications
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data - more specifically, the classifications themselves like "blue", "green",...
DataParser - Class in parser
An abstract class that implements the static method readFile.
doCalculateScore() - Method in class metrics.AbstractMultipleCategoryScore
A method that calculates the score for a given number of classes in a confusion matrix received in the parameters.
doCalculateScore(int) - Method in class metrics.perclass.AbstractAuxiliaryScores
An abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that receives the index of the class in the matrix to calculate the score from and returns a double with a score for that particular class

doGetScores() - Method in class metrics.AbstractMultipleCategoryScore

doGetScores() - Method in class metrics.F1Score
A method to return the list of Doubles with the calculated scores for each class of the ConfusionMatrix as well as a weighted average of all results in the last element of the list
